description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A turn based game where you can fight against the computer or a friend (Local 2 player, System Link and LIVE) in a strategic combat. Move your combat units on a board and engage in combats with combat units on the other team.
description.short: A turn based game where you can fight against the computer or a friend (Local 2 player, System Link and LIVE) in a strategic combat. Move your combat units on a board and engage in combats with combat units on the other team.
